features: High Quality and Ghibli Authorized : Authorized by cars brand, with anti-counterfeit label on the outer box.Size:5.12 inch x 1.97 inch x 1.42 inch.(1:36 Scale).

High-Quality Materials and Strong Pull Back: The car is made of zinc alloy, plastic parts, rubber tires. Our products have a CPC certificate, which complies with all US laws and regulations; no harm to children. Install a strong pull-back device that can slide 20 meters (65.6ft) on a smooth table.
Open Door Design and Realistic Interior: the front door of the car is designed separately, the double door can be opened; the interior decoration is very realistic, which is very good for children.
Best Gifts Toys:Pull back car is very easy to use for 3 years old. It is a good decompression toy for adults in the office.
100% After-Sales Service Satisfaction: TGRMC-CZ provides 100% after-sales service satisfaction, return within 30 days of receiving goods, and after-sales service within 1 year.
body.description: TGRCM-CZ Toy Car DescriptionProduct Introduction: It has obtained formal license from Ghibli brand and has obtained CPC certification, which complies with the laws and regulations of all continents in the United States. Die-cast metal and plastic parts. 1:36 model car, similar to the original car. How to use: Open its outer box and use a screwdriver (the item does not include a screwdriver) to remove the two fixing screws from the bottom. Product Use Scene: Your children can learn more about the car's knowledge and fun; you can use it as an ornament or decoration, put it on the display cabinet at home or put it on your car, it becomes Your piece of art. Note: Warning! The inclusion of small parts is a choking hazard. It is recommended that children under the age of 3 be used，With Adults must be present for supervision and guidance. After-sales service: 100% After-Sales Service Satisfaction: TGRMC-CZ provides 100% after-sales service satisfaction, return within 30 days of receiving goods, and after-sales service within 1 year.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Neat little car, but needs directions as previously identified in review.
reviews.reviewText: Getting this car out of the packaging is a challenge.It’s attached with a center attachment to packaging and it’s not obvious how to remove it until you shine a lite in two tiny holes and discover two tiny screws holding this to the car to packaging. Note the car is unusable until this is removed.You will need a very small/thin diameter screwdriver to remove the recessed screws.It would be very helpful if some directions were provided to the consumer, please spell these out in English and other languages.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I took a star off because the car arrived with some dirt or something on various spots of the car, but I was able to wipe it off easily enough, with only a minor blemish or two remaining on the paint job. I've never wanted a pink car, but if I did, this would be it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Beware - the model is the GranTurismo - not the Ghibli
reviews.reviewText: The description is wrong. The model you get (and the photo they show) is the GranTurismo and not the Ghibli.
